title: Hood Love and Loyalty 2
description: Money and Larissa have dealt with some of the fallout that comes with the street life. It seems like their relationship is doomed to fail before it even really gets started. Especially with more enemies mounting against them and Money's rise to power as a kingpin. In this second installment, follow the couple as they grow into their new roles and become the people they're destined to be. The question is whether or not they're better off together or apart. Will love and loyalty conquer and win out over those trying to tear the two apart? Or will the streets prevail?
author: E.L. Griffin
